title: Mango passion with honey and yoghurt
description: This quick and easy dessert is a light way to finish off a South-east Asian meal.Each serving provides 234kcal,	7g protein, 26g carbohydrate (of which 26g sugars), 10g fat (of which 7g saturates), 4g fibre and 0.2g salt.
ingredients: 1 small mango, peeled and cut into cubes
